page.title: 07Communications in Belsay
page.content: Of the 31 houses in this block only 2 do not have a telephone installed. There is one public telephone at Bolam Country Park. Nearly everyone has access to television and watched it regularly for news and entertainment. Most homes take a daily newspaper either national, local or both. There is a daily newspaper delivery service operated from the Post Office and Newsagent at Belsay. The Post is delivered to each house daily and there are two collections daily from the Post Office in Belsay. The County Council provide a mobile library service to many homes as requested.
